title: (x) Prospective Employees - Univers Ultra Condensed {Yves}
content:
Can anyone identify this font? It looks extremely familiar but I can't put my finger on it and What The Font is down. Thanks.   
   
 ![Prospective Employees image](http://web.archive.org/web/20100316121241im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/22865.gif)
author: cybjorg

comments.content: your sample is a little too small to tell, but it's very similar to HTF knockout.
Close enough for me. Thanks, guys.
A new alternative to Univers Compressed, which you might like, is TypeTrust's [Heroic Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20100316121241/http:/www.typetrust.com/font/heroiccondensed).

Heroic effort x 7 Tiffany ... did a bot from TypeTrust take over your computer? Lose a bet? Inside joke?

inquiring minds want to know. ;P

Alright. Alright. It was late. I was tired. I thought it would be nice to promote the new typeface. No need to be suspicious. It is me, after all, not some random person selling yarn made from dog fur. :^P When I come across a typeface that reminds me of an old thread I'll usually go back and add my suggestion. It just happens that this time I did it quite a few times. And besides, who cares if an old thread is revived? Did it cause a ripple in your life today? :^P
